channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How you can still get a refund for a delayed or canceled flight even as Trump scraps Biden’s airline compensation proposal

item.title: Treasury bonds aren’t the safe haven they’ve been in the past — and taxpayers will pay a price
item.description: The U.S. government faces hundreds of billions of dollars in additional interest payments

item.title: OPEC+ meets this weekend at a precarious time for crude oil. Here’s what’s at stake.

item.title: Robinhood finally gets a place in the S&P 500. These other stocks will join as well.
item.description: AppLovin and Emcor were also tapped to join the benchmark index later this month, as MarketAxess, Caesars and Enphase get the boot.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
